d:element.name: applet
d:element.d:template: var sName=this.getAttribute('name');var sAlign=this.getAttribute('align');var sHeight=this.getAttribute('height');this._._height=sHeight;var sWidth=this.getAttribute('width');var sCommonAttr=' height="'+sHeight+'" width="'+sWidth+'" align="'+sAlign+'" name="'+sName+'"';var oParams={};var sName,sCode;var aChildren=this.modelNode.childNodes;for(var i=0,iLimit=aChildren.length;i<iLimit;i++){if(aChildren[i].nodeType==1&&(aChildren[i].getAttribute('value')&&aChildren[i].getAttribute('name'))){if((sName=aChildren[i].getAttribute('name'))!='code'){oParams[sName]=aChildren[i].getAttribute('value');}else{sCode=aChildren[i].getAttribute('value');}}}var sApplet=(bb.browser.webkit?'<applet':'<object')+' code="'+sCode+'"';sApplet+=sCommonAttr;sApplet+='>';var sEmbedAttr='';for(var paramName in oParams){sApplet+='<param name="'+paramName+'" value="'+oParams[paramName]+'"></param>';sEmbedAttr+=paramName+'="'+oParams[paramName]+'" ';}sEmbedAttr+='code = "'+sCode+'" ';if(!bb.browser.webkit){sApplet+='<comment><embed type="application/x-java-applet" pluginspage="http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/download.html" ';sApplet+=sCommonAttr+sEmbedAttr+'>';sApplet+='</embed></comment>';sApplet+='</object>';}else{sApplet+='</applet>';}var oObj=bb.html.createElementFromString(sApplet);var oSpan=document.createElement('span');oSpan.style.display='none';try{oObj.insertBefore(oSpan,oObj.lastChild);}catch(e){}return [oObj,oSpan];
